name: Dread Drive: Undead Roads
summary: Dread Drive: Undead Roads puts you behind the wheel in VR after the fall. Race a minibus, pickup, or street car, grab supply crates from wrecks, and deliver them before the timer and a rolling radiation storm hit zero. Blast zombies off the doors with pistol, shotgun, or Uzi while dodging debris. Launch has four missions; earn cash to unlock better rides and guns. Roadmap: global leaderboards + train mission, online co-op, boss finale, endless mode. Quest 2/3/3 S/Pro. Deliver or die.
